title: Hey, Elon Musk, Comedy Doesn’t Want to Be Legal
description: He’s Twitter’s chief jokester, but as his free-speech impulses conflict with his push to label parodies, he shows a misunderstanding of how humor works.
dc:creator: Jason Zinoman

media:content.media:credit: Frederic J. Brown/Agence France-Presse — Getty Images
media:content.media:description: The reality is that good comedy can’t be suppressed.
